description.en:
Busan, 1936. Yeon Jeong lives her life without fitting in anywhere, until she meets a mermaid by fate. The mermaid tells her that she has come to pick her up as promised, and asks her to follow her to the place where eternal happiness lies.  
  
"Can I be happy there at last, living as myself?

Because of mysterious human-eating creatures named “Arnis”, humanity has gone near extinct. In order to meet his close friend Nika, a 16 years old boy Evan enlists himself in platoon Able, an army that has obtained supernatural abilities with the materials they gained from Arnis. And the world, which to some is the past, some is the future, some is the present, starts to move.

I don’t want to work. I really don’t want to work. But I have no choice.
Problems with Humans, Elves, Orcs, Trolls, Dragons and such alien immigrants never seem to cease.
800 years of disgusted employment. The struggles of a man who will die if he stops working.

title.en: Disney Twisted Wonderland - The Comic - ~Episode of Octavinelle~

altTitles.ja: ディズニー ツイステッドワンダーランド THE COMIC ～EPISODE of OCTAVINELLE～

description.en: In a world where people suddenly developed super-powers, those who used their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow fell in love with the strongest female prisoner Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

title.en: The Terminally Ill Young Master of the Baek Clan

altTitles.en: Baek Clan's Terminally Ill Young Master

description.en: Baek Yigang is a son of the Baek Clan, one of the seven great clans of Zhongyuan. Afflicted with the Taiyin Qi Blockage, he is cursed with a shortened lifespan and the inability to collect internal energy. He had been peacefully spending the rest of his days indoors when he was ambushed by a group of masked people. During the ambush, he lost his servant who was like a sister to him. Chased by the attackers, Baek Yigang escaped through a secret underground path. When he came across a blocked path, he decided he’d at least die fighting and picked up a rusted sword that was stuck in the ground…

"I didn’t marry my wife because I loved her. I just signed a contract with her at her request."
I actually knew the truth, so it’s not his fault. I was the one who developed false expectations. I had spent three years as his wife. and I tried hard to be the right woman for him, but I couldn’t get a piece of his heart.
"I didn’t know it would last this long. It’s annoying."
I was nothing to him to the extent that he all but forgot about me as soon as the heroine appeared. In the end, she was always going to be the main character and I was always going to be an extra. No matter how hard I try, my role isn't changing. So it’s only right for me to leave.
"I’m sorry I’ve been bothering you all this time. Please be happy with her."
description.ko: 아슬란의 아내로 지냈던 3년. 그에게 어울리는 여자가 되려고 무던히 노력했으나, 그의 마음을 얻을 수 없었다. 소설 속 여자 주인공이 나타나자마자 버려질 정도로, 나는 그에게 아무것도 아닌 존재였다. 주인공은 주인공, 엑스트라는 엑스트라. 아무리 애를 써도 나는 고작해야 귀찮은 엑스트라에 불과할 뿐. 그러니까 내가 떠나는 게 맞는 것이다.
description.tr: Siz Aşıkken ben aslında gerçeği biliyordum. “Karımla onu sevdiğim için evlenmedim.” Yani bu onun hatası değildi. Yanlış beklentilere sahip olmak benim hatamdı. “Onunla sadece ihtiyaçlara dayalı bir sözleşme imzaladım.” Karısı olarak üç yıl. Onun için doğru kadın olmak için çok uğraştım ama kalbinden bir parça alamadım. “Bu kadar uzun süreceğini bilmiyordum. Sinir bozucu.” Kadın kahraman ortaya çıkar çıkmaz bir kenara atıldığım ölçüde onun için bir hiçtim. Sonunda, ana karakter ana karakterdi ve figüran da figürandı. Ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım, ben sadece sinir bozucu bir figürandım. Rolüm değişmedi. Bu yüzden ayrılmak benim için doğru. “Bunca zaman seni rahatsız ettiğim için özür dilerim. Lütfen onunla mutlu ol.”

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: I Encountered A False Spiritual Revival

altTitles.zh: 我遇到了假的灵气复苏

description.en: Everyone in the world is mentally ill, except me! (Confirmed!)

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

altTitles.th: ดรูอิดแห่งสถานีโซล

description.de:
Was wie ein gewöhnlicher Tag begann, wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als eine mysteriöse Katastrophe die Erde heimsucht und Soo Ho Park auf einen anderen Planeten befördert. Mit der Zeit lernt er, sich anzupassen und um sein Überleben in dieser fremden Welt zu kämpfen. Doch eines Tages wird Soo Ho genauso plötzlich wieder auf die Erde zurückgeholt, wie er auf dem neuen Planeten gelandet ist. Schnell erfährt er, dass eine Rückkehr zu seinem vergangenen Leben nicht möglich ist, denn die Erde befindet sich in einem ständigen Kampf mit Monstern, denen es gelungen ist, den Planeten zu infiltrieren. Wie wird Soo Ho gegen die Monster ankämpfen und wird er dieses Mal mit seinen derzeitigen Fähigkeiten überleben können?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/guilaideyishijiewangzhe/list?title_no=1771)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3367)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001631)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/the-druid-of-seoul-station/list?title_no=3642)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3586)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/seoul-station-druid/list?title_no=3301)
description.en:
What started out as an ordinary day turned upside down when an unknown catastrophe struck Earth, transporting Suho Park to a different planet. He eventually learns how to adapt and fight for his survival in this foreign world, but one day, just as suddenly as he was sucked into this new planet, Suho is pulled back to Earth!

 He quickly learns that return to life as he remembers it is no longer possible, as Earth is in constant battle with monsters who’ve managed to infiltrate the planet.

How will Suho fight against the monsters attacking Earth, and will he be able to survive this time with his current skills?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/guilaideyishijiewangzhe/list?title_no=1771)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3367)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3586)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/seoul-station-druid/list?title_no=3301)
description.fr:
Ce qui a commencé comme une journée ordinaire a basculé lorsqu'une catastrophe inconnue a frappé la Terre, transportant Suho Park sur une autre planète. Ce dernier apprend peu à peu à s'adapter et à se battre pour survivre dans ce monde étranger, mais un jour, tout aussi soudainement qu'il a été transporté sur cette nouvelle planète, Suho est miraculeusement ramené sur Terre. Il apprend rapidement que le retour à la vie normale telle qu'il se souvient n'est plus possible, car la Terre est en lutte constante avec des monstres qui ont réussi à s'infiltrer sur la planète. Suho trouvera-t-il un moyen de se battre contre les monstres qui attaquent la Terre, et pourra-t-il survivre avec ses compétences actuelles ?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/guilaideyishijiewangzhe/list?title_no=1771)

description.id:
Suho, kembali ke Bumi setelah seribu tahun menghilang di dunia lain. Namun, dunia yang dulu ditinggali sekarang telah berubah menjadi dunia kebiadaban dengan munculnya monster-monster!

description.ja:
「この世界の支配者は俺だ！」 異世界に迷い込んでから1000年ぶりに地球に帰還した緒形元汰。その間に、地球はモンスターの登場により、完璧な弱肉強食の世界に変わっていた。異世界にて1000もの間、激しい生存競争のすえに、動物の王として降臨した緒形元汰は、ドルイドとして地球征服に乗り出す！

---

description.ko:
이세계로 사라진 뒤 천 년 만에 지구로 귀환한, 박수호.
그 사이 세상은 몬스터의 등장으로 철저한 약육강식의 세상으로 변해 있었다.
천 년 동안 처절한 생존경쟁으로 살아남은 동물의 왕 드루이드, 세계 정복에 나서다.

이제부터 이 구역의 지배자는 나다.

---

description.pl:
Park Sooho powrócił na Ziemię po tym, jak przeniósł się do innego świata na tysiąc lat. W tym czasie Ziemia zmieniła się w świat przetrwania najsilniejszych dzięki pojawieniu się potworów. Druid, król zwierząt, któremu udało się przetrwać przez tysiąc lat, wyrusza teraz na podbój świata.

---

description.ru:
Пак Су Хо, провел тысячу лет с животными и стал друидом.
Тем временем мир превратился в мир жестокости и появились монстры. Друид и царь зверей,
выживший в ожесточенной битве за выживание в течение тысячи лет, отправляется покорять мир.
"Отныне я правитель!"

---

description.th:
"พัคซูโฮ" กลับมายังโลก หลังจากที่ตกไปอีกโลกนับพันปี ในขณะเดียวกัน โลกที่ซูโฮเคยอาศัยอยู่ได้กลายเป็นสนามรบตั้งแต่มีมอนสเตอร์ปรากฏตัวจากอีกโลกหนึ่ง จากนี้ไป พัคซูโฮ ดรูอิดผู้รอดชีวิตจากป่าอันโหดร้ายและกลายเป็นราชาแห่งสัตว์ ได้เริ่มต้นการต่อสู้เพื่อพิชิตโลก!

description.zh:
千年归来的万物之王！
从现在开始出击征服世界！
朴修浩意外来到异世界后，在千年的生存竞争中成功存活并成为了动物之王。时隔千年又意外重返地球。 在此期间，世界因为怪兽的出现，而彻底变成了弱肉强食的世界。为了继续生存朴修浩开始征服人类世界！

---

altTitles.en: The Heavenly Demon Can't Live a Normal Life
The Reincarnation of the Dark Master

altTitles.uk: Небесний демон не може жити нормальним життям

altTitles.pt-br: O Demônio Celestial não pode viver uma Vida Normal

description.en:
“Is this a mission I was sent on by the gods? Or is this just divine punishment?”

Baek Jung-hyeok, the Heavenly Demon of Murim, finds that he’s been reincarnated into the body of Roman Dimitri, the dim-witted son of a baron who’s obsessed with the luxuries of the aristocratic lifestyle. But with his new status, Jung-hyeok is ready to shake things up on the continent of Salamander.

Will the divine demon accomplish what he’s set out to do? And will he finally get the answers to this mysterious reincarnation?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ko:
천마 백중혁, 드미트리 가문의 장남으로 눈을 뜨다.
드미트리의 얼간이, 차남에게 밀린 장남.
세간의 평판은 중요하지 않다.
천마, 아니, 로만 드미트리는 앞으로 평범하게 살 수 없다.
압도하는 천마 판타지!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ru:
Демон Пэк Чун Хёк.
Некогда сильнейшая личность в Муриме умирает и обнаруживает себя в теле старшего сына дома Дмитрий. В теле человека, которого все называют дураком. Человека, который постоянно находится в тени своего младшего брата и которому глубоко плевать на мнение окружающих.
Но теперь, демон... Нет, Роман Дмитрий больше не сможет жить привычной жизнью.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.uk: "Це місія, на яку мене послали боги? Чи це просто божественна кара?" Пек Чжун Хьок, божественний демон, повелитель Муріма, виявляє, що він реінкарнувався в тіло Романа Дмитровича, недоумкуватого сина барона, одержимого розкішшю аристократичного способу життя. Але з новим статусом Чжун Хьок готовий перевернути все на континенті Саламандр. Чи вдасться божественному демону досягти того, що він задумав? І чи отримає він нарешті відповіді на загадки цього таємничого перевтілення?
description.zh:
最强教主重生成异国废柴！
天不亡我！今生注定不凡！
武林最强天魔神教教主白钟赫生命自然终结后再睁眼发现自己成为了卢曼·德米特里，德米特里公认的傻子，且不如弟弟的德米特里长子。但外人的评价已经不重要。从此卢曼将不再浑浑噩噩，他的生活将会发生天翻地覆的变化，卢曼注定不再平凡！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.pt-br:
“O Demônio Celestial” Baek Joong-Hyuk abre os olhos como o filho mais velho da família Dimitry. Conhecido como o idiota da família, deixado de lado por causa do segundo filho. A opinião do mundo é irrelevante. “Demônio Celestial”, não, Roman Dimitry, não pode viver uma vida normal.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)

title.en: Motokano ni Gensou wo Idaku na Baka: Nishizawa 5mm Tanpenshuu

altTitles.ja: 西沢5ミリ短編集 元カノに幻想を抱くなバーカ

description.en:
1-2. Motokano ni Gensou wo Idaku na Baka
3-4. Tanin no Sex wo Souzou suruna
5-6. Otaku ♥ Kimo ♥♥♥
7. Kareshi ga Iru Onnanoko to Tsukiau Houhou
8. Konna Toki no Tame ni
9. Kore dakara Kawaii Onna wa
10. Karui ka Omoi ka
11. Dame ni Shitekoyou to Suru Nenshuu 5-bai Kanojo to Dame ni Naritakunai Kaji Zenpan Tokui Shachiku Otoko
12. Ienai, Valentine Day
13. Anata no Chinchin Kashite Kudasai
description.ja:
大学の新入生歓迎会で話題が「初キスは何歳か?」になり
中学の時に女の子とキスしたことある早見(♀)は「まだです」と嘘をつくが
その場にファーストキスの相手、町野(♀)がいてなんやかんや起きる百合漫画です。

altTitles.zh: 女神、异世界和变成砖头虫的我

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン・マジェスティ

description.en:
Juyoon Oh is a typical guy trying to find a full-time job. But one day, he dives into the Han River and puts himself at risk of drowning to save a child that fell in. As he is about to meet an untimely death, a goddess appears before him and gives him a chance at another life... not as a hero or wizard, but as a weak, skill-less “brick larva.” It's the beginning of an atrocious adventure, and the road to become a hero is long!

---

description.fr:
Son rêve se réalise quand il se réincarne dans un monde fantastique ! Il va enfin pouvoir vivre les mêmes aventures que les héros de ses histoires favorites ! Bon, il n’a aucune compétences, ni capacités spéciales mais ça va bien finir par arriver non ? Eh bien non… Il semblerait qu’il soit vraiment en bas de la chaîne alimentaire, et qu’il soit condamné à y rester.

---

description.ja:
しがない貧乏大学生の克樹。 バイトの帰り道、人助けするために飛び込んだ川であっけなく死んでしまう。 尊い魂の持ち主として美しい死神（？）に見込まれ、異世界転生の機会を手に入れるが、転生したのは地下都市の最弱生物「レンガムシ」だった！ 自分が転生したのか、死んで地獄に落ちたのか見分けがつかないほどの虫ライフ。 それをやっと終えたと思ったら、今度は「合成ゾンビ下僕」の人生が待っていた…！ せっかく転生したのに、克樹は異世界のヒーローになれないままなのか!? 破天荒な異世界生存記がいま始まる。

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%98%EC%A0%84-%EB%A7%88%EC%A0%9C%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0/2461)

description.ko:
별볼일 없는 알바생 오주윤. 우연한 사건으로 죽을 뻔 하지만, 선량한 마음씨 덕분에 이세계에서 환생할 기회를 얻는다. 하지만 다시 얻은 몸은 영웅도, 마법사도 아닌 최하위 능력치 바닥, '벽돌굼벵이'!? 본격 예지력 하강 레벨업 판타지!

---

description.ru:
О Джу Юн — обычный работник на полставки. Он почти погибает в результате случайного инцидента, но благодаря его доброте, ему выпадает шанс переродиться в другом мире. Но его не ждало будущее героя или мага… он переродился в «кирпичного червя» — существо, находящееся на дне пищевой цепи.  
Сюрреалистичные события! Беспрецедентное фэнтези!

---

description.zh:
平凡的兼职大学生吴祝仁，因为救人而溺水身亡。因为生性善良，他获得了在异世界转生的机会。 但转生后的他既不是英雄，也不是魔法师，竟然是个能力值和长相都为最低等的生物——“小砖头虫”。 他会面临怎样的危机？他能否一步步提升自己的能力，最终成为地下城的主人呢？

title.en: Baby Concubine Wants to Live Quietly

altTitles.es: La concubina bebé quiere vivir tranquila

description.en:
I possessed a supporting character in a reverse harem novel.

A young concubine who, in the end, was driven to death for treason after begging for attention from the regnant empress who was the female lead, and doing wicked things to the male leads who were the concubines.

Despite everything, the fortunate thing was that I possessed her right after entering the Imperial Palace.

Even if everyone in the Imperial Palace were wary of me, they didn’t hate me yet.

‘Let’s not be impudent, and be obedient.’

I obstinately didn’t need nor have the mindset of trying to be loved by the Empress. Although the male leads who were the concubines were giving me glances, I could just lie flat.

Since it wasn’t even a very difficult thing, I really did so. It was definitely like that, but–

“Come to my bedchamber tonight. I’ll read you a fairy tale book!”

“P-please don’t cry. I’ll give you this.”

Just why is everyone’s attitude endlessly gentle? I couldn’t understand. And it was baffling.

‘…I don’t need it though?’

I wasn’t really a young kid lacking affection. And that gaze in which they looked at me as if I was the loveliest in the world was extremely uncomfortable.

Just where would I use a fairy tale book that’s full of jewels and silk, and the magic pearl which is the Imperial family’s heirloom?

Since it’s already been done, I just wish for everyone to get out of my palace.

Mie is a dull high school student who happens to be a professional manga author. He hires an assistant, but the person who came is the number one gal in his class! Despite her looks though, she's extremely good at what she does, and working with her is exciting, stimulating, busy, and fun!!
description.fr: Mie est un lycéen ennuyeux qui se trouve être un mangaka professionnel. Il engage une assistante, mais la personne qui arrive est la plus grande gal de son lycée ! Malgré son physique, elle est extrêmement douée dans ce qu'elle fait, et travailler avec elle est excitant, stimulant, prenant et amusant !

description.en: A comic about the daily life of dungeon boys. Slaying the city, saving the dragons... or something like that.
description.pl: Komiks o codziennym życiu lochowych chłopców. Mordowanie miasta, ratowanie smoków... czy coś w tym stylu.

description.en: The intelligent Hong Danwoo who also is an introvert, has a secret that’s also a problem… He’s unable to get a haircut! But that isn’t the only issue… He’s broke. So, in search of a job, Danwoo finds himself at a small hair salon where he meets a remarkably attractive hairstylist, Kwon Tae-han. A fateful occurrence unfolds when Dan-woo can't help but feel an intense sensation from Tae-Han’s skillful touch while he’s getting his haircut. Unable to hold back his feelings towards the touching, he says,“ Um… When you touch my head, it feels like this…”In the end, Dan-woo decides to confess his little problem with Taehan expecting to receive judgment, Taehan offers to help him instead of thinking he’s some kind of pervert. In order to become a better version of himself, Dan-woo starts up secret training sessions with Taehan. But little does he know, these hidden training sessions become more than just training sessions.
description.es-la: Peluquero Coqueto X Nerd Sensible. ¡Cómo puede ser que la zona erógena de alguien sea su cuero cabelludo/cabello...! Hong Dan-woo es un chico extremadamente introvertida que no tiene ni un solo amigo porque su zona erógena es el cuero cabelludo/cabello. Un día, su jefe a tiempo parcial le dice que se corte el pelo por el bien de su larga melena, ¡así que se arma de valor y va a una peluquería unipersonal a cortarse el pelo...!

description.en:
A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!  


---
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

title.en: My Clumsy and Erotic Neighbor Sayuri-san

altTitles.ja: 不器用でエロい隣人さゆりさん

altTitles.es-la: Mi torpe y erótica vecina Sayuri-san

description.en: Series Follows Our Main Character and His Interactions With His Neighbor Sayuri-san.
description.ja: 高校生の主人公が、隣人の主婦である「さゆりさん」と様々なエロティックなシチュエーションを繰り広げるというストーリー。

altTitles.vi: Merumo và Những viên kẹo thần kì

description.en:
A fantasy story for kids featuring a girl named Melmo, who can change her age as she wishes by eating special candies.  
  
Melmo's mother dies in a traffic accident, leaving young Melmo and her younger brother Totoo. Anxious, Melmo's mother in heaven asks God to prepare some magical candies, and hands them to Melmo.  
There are two kinds: Melmo can grow 10 years older to become any sort of adult she wishes by eating a blue candy. By eating a red one, she can become 10 years younger.  
  
Using these miracle candies, Melmo disguises herself as a nurse, schoolteacher, policewoman, and overcomes troubles together with her brother, Totoo.

---
**Volume 280 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

The immortal masterpiece "Ultraman" by Daiji Ichimine, a legend in the world of hero comics, is back in a perfect version!! Using plenty of original drawings and magazines newly discovered through research, it has been revised from the previous books. The cover art, which was never published, is also included in its entirety for the first time. Furthermore, the first volume includes a complete color reproduction of the "Monster Neronga Volume" that was not included in the SUNDAY COMICS version, as well as the original prequel to this work, "The Birth of Ultraman Volume", which is included for the first time in a book. This is truly the “final definitive edition”, delivered with the highest specifications ever, which has never been realized even though it has been published many times!! Volumes 1 and 2 will be released simultaneously!! (C) Tsuburaya Productions

Childhood friends Seunghwan, Dohee and Sangmin continue their cherished friendship even when they entered high school. However, they’re friend Sangmin disappeared due to the appearance of grosteque creatures called Goei (Gui)… As they search for their friend Sangmin, they found a few secrets… Will Seunghwan be able to recover his childhood friend?
description.ko:
「그 욕망… 내가 이루어 줄까?」

사이좋은 소꿉친구였던 승환, 도희, 상민은
고등학생이 되어서도 끈끈한 우정을 이어가는 듯 했으나,
기묘한 존재인 「괴이」의 등장과 함께 상민이 사라져 버리고 마는데…!

상민의 흔적을 찾아가며 밝혀지는 비밀들…
승환은 어린 시절의 우정을 되찾을 수 있을까?

description.en: Yuki Kurihara is a girl who has finally been granted her wish of dating her crush Shinya Momotsuki (Momo). At first glance, she just looks like a normal but very cute girl. However, she is in fact a maniac over Momo, taking notes of his activities and never missing the chance to see him in a cute moment. Momo, on the other hand, is inexperienced in love, and just wants to make Yuki happy.
Front-line stories of the Defense Force not covered in the main series!

When one day a Meteorite crushed on earth, the lifes of the three best friends Hitokazu, Nic and Victor suddenly changed as on their last jointed school-year they are faced with the consequences the meteorite brought with itself. The people that had survived the impact have suddenly developed powers and abilities human beings normally can not achieve but those who didnt gain those new abilities, just dissolved.

altTitles.ja: フランケン・ふらん Frantic
フランケン・ふらん フランティック

description.en:
The wacky adventures of Fran, Veronica and the other strange creatures continue.  
  
More experiments, more medical miracles and more wondrous surprises.

Monsters appear in the water, and in the crowd of humans driven to the desert.
Cabre meets a mysterious girl named Maya.

A story about Maya, who has a special ability that is different from others, and leaves for the harmony between monsters and humans.

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
The student council president, Takamine-san, is at the topmost of the school hierarchy, a goddess! One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san’s naked breasts. From then, his school life changed, blackmailed into a life of servitude toward Takamine-san. ― “Put my panties on for me”  
Shirota-kun has ended up in a predicament of Takamine-san’s pink colored favors.  
  


---
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuichi_hiiragi)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2056601)  
- [Official Page (JP)](https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/joker/series/takamine/)

description.en: At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

Im Hwapyung. A man who wants to live a normal life like his name. Everything he had in his mundane life was destroyed. [Your love has become my loathing.] You shouldn’t have messed with me in the first place. You should have just let me live a quiet life. And now he has began his move that none of his nemesis will survive his wrath.

When playing a virtual reality game called Cang Lan, Xiao Wan gets pushed off a cliff. She ends up in another game world. What will happen to Xiao Wan?

---
**Contents:** 147 (or 410 split chapter parts) (S1) + >197 (S2) = >344 chapters
- **Season 1:** vol. 1 ch. 1-147 (1-147)
- **Season 2:** vol. 2 ch. 1-197+ (148-344+) (ongoing)

**Note:** season 1 chapter 1-114 is in single page format. Starting with season 1 chapter 115, the page format switches to long strip.

title.en: The End is a Game to Me

altTitles.en: The End Of World Is A Game

description.en:
Go Cheon-su, is an unemployed Game Streamer. With only 1 viewer.

One day, he is picked as a Player and is thrown into a real-world survival game.

The game clear condition is to not die. The 24*7 Survival Stream begins.

A bachelor for the past 11 years, Higuchi Yuuki is a male teacher in an all-girls school. He keeps wondering how to bridge the gap between himself and his students when he's suddenly confessed to by Ichikawa, one of his students! Although Higuchi rejects her, Ichikawa does all she can to get her teacher to turn her way – even if it means making him grope her and holding his hand in class! When Higuchi can't understand why she'd like an unimpressive and inexperienced guy like him, she kisses him! Will Higuchi be able to handle the feelings of his beautiful student, especially when she is not the only one to have fallen for him?!? A dramatic school love story unfolds!
description.es: Soltero desde hace 11 años, Higuchi Yuuki es profesor en una escuela sólo para chicas. No deja de preguntarse cómo acortar la distancia entre él y sus alumnos cuando repentinamente se confiesa Ichikawa, una de sus alumnas. Aunque Higuchi la rechaza, Ichikawa hace todo lo que puede para que su profesor se dé la vuelta… ¡incluso si eso significa que la manoseen y le tomen la mano en clase! ¡Cuando Higuchi no puede entender por qué le gustaría un chico tan poco impresionante e inexperto como él, lo besa! ¿Será Higuchi capaz de manejar los sentimientos de su bella alumna, especialmente cuando ella no es la única que se ha enamorado de él? ¡Se desarrolla una dramática historia de amor en la escuela!
description.fr: Célibataire depuis 11 ans, Higuchi Yuuki est professeur dans une école de filles. Il se demande comment combler le fossé qui le sépare de ses élèves lorsque Ichikawa, l'une de ses élèves, lui avoue soudainement son amour ! Bien que Higuchi la rejette, Ichikawa fait tout ce qu'elle peut pour amener son professeur à changer d'avis - même si cela signifie qu'il doit la tripoter et lui tenir la main en classe ! Lorsque Higuchi ne comprend pas pourquoi elle aime un garçon aussi peu impressionnant et inexpérimenté que lui, elle l'embrasse ! Higuchi sera-t-il capable de gérer les sentiments de sa belle étudiante, surtout quand elle n'est pas la seule à être tombée amoureuse de lui ? Une histoire d'amour dramatique se déroule dans une école !
description.ja: 教師になるのが夢だった。学校が好きで人が好きで、だけど彼女いない暦＝年齢。そんな僕が女子校の教師になった。そして、教師として生徒を指導するはずだった。百の迂遠な駆け引きよりも、たった一言「好き」がいい。ド直球JKに翻弄されるエロ＆キュンラブストーリー開幕!!
description.pt: Solteiro nos últimos 11 anos, Higuchi Yuuki é professor de uma escola só para garotas. Ele continua se perguntando como diminuir a distância entre ele e suas alunas quando de repente uma de suas alunas, Ichikawa, se confessa para ele! Embora Higuchi a rejeite, Ichikawa faz tudo o que pode para tentar convencer seu professor a aceitar sua confissão – mesmo que isso signifique fazê-lo tocá-la e segurar sua mão durante a aula! Quando Higuchi não consegue entender o motivo dela gostar de um cara inexpressivo e inexperiente como ele, ela o beija! Higuchi será capaz de lidar com os sentimentos da sua bela aluna, especialmente quando ela não é a única a se apaixonar por ele?! Uma dramática história de amor escolar começa!

altTitles.th: ศึกเดือด 5 วิพลิกชะตา

description.en:
It was just a usual morning.  
  
Akira Shiroyanagi, a high schooler who loves games and Konpeito (Japanese sweets), is suddenly dragged into a battlefield by a mysterious girl who calls herself Mion. The participants are told that they are "erased from the family register, involved in an experiment, and have gained certain powers."  
  
Akira is determined to win the game with his newfound powers and destroy the organization. Armed with a power no one expects and his "brain" skills, a new era of intelligence battle of begins!

Classroom outcasts Shin-su and Jin-o were forced to eat Physarum Polycephalum because of school bullies.

The two outcasts, who are still bullied and ignored at school, gradually take over the food chain while keeping their identities a secret. However, as the slime traces start to surface one by one, they start to cause social problems, and the fight intensifies when Kim Soo-hyuk, who created a mutated blob experiment, appears.

title.en: Genjisu Sekai Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?

altTitles.ja: 現実世界でも幸せにしてくださいね？

altTitles.es-la: Sé feliz también en el mundo real, ¿de acuerdo?

altTitles.en: Be happy in the world too, okay?

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjisu Sekai Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?

description.en:
High school student Machino, who longs for the 'love of destiny', encounters the dating simulation game 'Celestia'. Despite having maximized sympathy for all the heroines, she can't decide on just one, leading her to spend days of anguish unable to advance to the confession event. At that moment, an explosion along with a shooting star occurs in her house, and when she opens her eyes, she meets the main heroine of 'Celestia', Sofia....

"Machino... I always wanted to say it... I like you."

The otherworldly harem summoning romantic comedy begins with the highly sympathetic heroines who have jumped into the real world!
description.es-la:
La estudiante de secundaria, Machino, que anhela el 'amor del destino', se encuentra con el juego de simulación de citas 'Celestia'. A pesar de haber aumentado al máximo la simpatía de todas las heroínas, no puede decidirse por una sola, lo que la lleva a pasar días de angustia sin poder avanzar al evento de confesión. En ese momento, una explosión junto con una estrella fugaz ocurre en su casa, y cuando abre los ojos, se encuentra con la heroína principal de 'Celestia', Sofía...

"Machino... siempre quise decirlo... me gustas."

¡La comedia romántica de harén de invocación a otro mundo comienza con las heroínas de alta simpatía que han saltado al mundo real!

altTitles.ja: ぷにるはかわいいスライム

description.en: The first unique romantic comedy manga in the history of CoroCoro! The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
description.ja: コロコロ史上初、異色のラブコメまんが！！ 自分の作ったスライムが女の子に変身!?　ぷにるの自由気ままな言動に少年・コタローは振り回されっぱなし。毎日愉快なドキドキ生活だ!!

description.en:
This is the version of Okamoto Keiko based in the anime.  
It is the year 2020 and computers have become an integral part of daily life for most people. However, a teenage girl Yui Kasuga is one of the few who cannot use computers at all, despite the fact that her father is a software developer. An evil computer called Grosser wants to take over the ComNet (what the Internet is called in Yui's time) and as the programs that have been developed to stop it (called "Correctors") need her help, she is sucked into the ComNet where she is recruited by a corrector called I.R., who gives her downloadable element suits that allow her to become the ComNet Fairy Corrector Yui who can fight Grosser's computer viruses.

altTitles.de: Ich würde mir gerne eine Freundin ausleihen

altTitles.th: สะดุดรักยัยแฟนเช่า

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?

---
**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

altTitles.uk: Чи правда, що ви одружуєтесь? [365 днів до весілля]

altTitles.ja: 結婚するって、本当ですか

altTitles.ja-ro: Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka

altTitles.th: แต่งงานที่ว่านี่เรื่องจริงเหรอครับ?

description.en: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
description.ru: Такуя и Рика — коллеги по туристическому агентству, они практически не общались друг с другом, так как оба — интроверты. Оба заняты своим делом, как обычно, когда приходит объявление от вышестоящего руководства: через год в Сибири откроется зарубежный филиал, и сотрудник из их отдела будет отправлен туда на работу! Неизвестно, кого выберут, но объяснили, что вероятность того, что туда отправят женатых и имеющих семьи, гораздо ниже, чем одиночек! Ни Такуя, ни Рика не хотят ехать в Сибирь! Отчаявшись защитить свою одинокую жизнь, они придумывают план: сделать вид, что женятся друг на друге! Смогут ли они продержаться 365 дней и, может быть, даже влюбиться друг в друга за это время?
description.uk: Гонджоуджі Ріка та Оогара Такуя працюють у відділі планування туристичної агенції JTC в Токіо, вони не люблять спілкуватися і повноцінно живуть спокійним життям наодинці. Однак через відкриття філії в Сибіру Ріка запропонувала Такуї план, щоб не відправитися за кордон. Чи одружаться ці двоє замкнутих людей всього за 365 днів?
description.pt-br: Takuya e Rika são colegas de trabalho de uma agência de viagens e quase nunca interagiram, pois ambos são introvertidos, pessoas anti-sociais. Ambos estão fazendo seu trabalho normalmente quando um anúncio dos superiores chega: em um ano, uma filial no exterior será aberta na Sibéria, e um funcionário de sua localidade será enviado para trabalhar lá! Embora não se saiba quem será escolhido para ir, explica-se que as pessoas que são casadas e têm família são muito menos propensas a serem enviadas! Nem o Takuya nem a Rika querem ir para a Sibéria! Desesperados para proteger suas vidas solitárias, eles criam um plano: fingir que vão se casar um com o outro! Serão capazes de manter esta farsa por 365 dias, e, talvez, até se apaixonar um pelo o outro nesse tempo?

description.en:
Feng Wu was born with the true blood of the phoenix and was hailed as a peerless genius in all of Junwu. However, her blessing was also a curse...it placed a target on her back. After she was attacked and had her blood stolen, her master Mu Jiuzhou exhausted his spiritual power to save Feng Wu and disappeared right in front of her. Powerless, she could only watch.

Starting again from the beginning, she resolves herself "Zuo Qingyun, our relation is irreconcilable, I cannot live in a world with you in it!"

Watch how our "useless" protagonist becomes a phoenix step by step!
description.fr:
Feng Wu, une jeune fille talentueuse, perd son sang de phénix et devient inutile après avoir été piégée par son ennemi Zuo Qingyuan. Son professeur tombe dans un profond sommeil après l'avoir sauvée. Fei Chai, une étudiante en médecine traditionnelle de l'ère moderne, entre accidentellement dans ce monde fantastique par le biais d'un jeu et prend l'identité de Feng Wu. Il s'avère que Feng Wu a conclu un accord de mariage avec Jun Linyuan, prince du clan Jun Wu. Feng Wu commence une nouvelle vie, utilisant ses connaissances modernes et ses compétences médicales pour aider sa famille, tout en passant ses journées à se cultiver. Elle se fait ainsi de nouveaux amis et tombe amoureuse de Jun Linzhou.

⋆┊Adapté du novel "Godly Empress Doctor" de Su Xiaonuan

altTitles.en: Negative Hero and Demon King's General

altTitles.ja: ネガティブ勇者と魔王軍幹部

altTitles.pt-br: A heroína negativa e o general do rei demônio

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Negatif dan Kepala Pasukan Iblis

altTitles.ru: Депрессивный герой и повелитель армии демонов

altTitles.zh-hk: 消極勇者與魔王軍幹部

altTitles.vi: Anh Hùng Tiêu Cực Và Thống Lĩnh Quân Đoàn Quỷ

description.de: Was passiert, wenn der Held im Schloss des Generals der Dämonen ankommt und weiß, dass sie ihn nicht besiegen kann? Sie weint und wird vom General der Dämonen selbst getröstet!
description.en:
What happens when the hero arrives at the castle of the general of the demons and knows that they wouldn't be able to defeat it? She cries and is comforted by the general of demons himself!

Buy the physical volumes:  
[MelonBooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=455318)
[Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/item/040030692701)
description.vi: Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra khi một anh hùng đặt chân vào lâu đài của tướng quỷ và đối mặt với hắn? Cô bé anh hùng của chúng ta lại khóc nức nở và được chính tên quỷ đó dỗ dành!
description.pt-br: O que acontece quando uma heróina chega ao castelo do general do rei dos demônios e sabe que não conseguiria o derrotar? Ela chora e é consolada pelo próprio general do rei dos demônios!

title.ja: Tenkousaki no Seiso Karen na Bishoujo ga, Mukashi Danshi to Omotte Issho ni Asonda Osananajimi datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転校先の清楚可憐な美少女が、昔男子と思って一緒に遊んだ幼馴染だった件

altTitles.en: The Neat and Beautiful Girl at My New School is My Childhood Friend Who I Used to Play With Thinking She Was a Boy

altTitles.zh-hk: 我在轉校後遇到的清純可愛美少女，是我曾認為是男孩子並一塊玩耍過的青梅竹馬

altTitles.ru: Аккуратная и красивая девушка в моей новой школе - моя подруга детства, с которой я играл,думая, что она мальчик.

description.en:
I met my childhood friend again, and she had become a beautiful and innocent girl.

"It's been a while, Hayato."
"Haruki, is it?"

In the past, I used to play in the mud with my childhood friend in the countryside, and when I saw him again, there was no trace of the bratty young man I thought he was back then. Only in front of Hayato, she threw away the coat she was wearing and reacted in the same crass way she did back then. The distance between you and me has not changed.

The popular fluff webnovel is now in Manga form!
description.pt-br:
Reencontrei minha amiga de infância e ela se tornou uma garota linda e inocente.

"Já faz um tempo, Hayato."
"Haruki, não é?"

No passado, eu costumava brincar na lama com meu amigo de infância no campo e, quando o vi novamente, não havia nenhum vestígio do jovem malcriado que eu pensava que ele era naquela época. Só que na frente de Hayato ela jogou fora o casaco que vestia e reagiu da mesma forma grosseira de naquela época. A distância entre você e eu não mudou.

A popular webnovel fofa agora está em formato mangá!

title.en: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Orusuban Imouto no Yume wo Minai

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はおるすばん妹の夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту сестры-домоседки

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Orusuban Imouto no Yume wo Minai

altTitles.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Sister Home Alone

description.en:
The Kaede arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Another day of house-sitting for Azusagawa Kaede. As long as her beloved onii-chan is by her side, she was fine with staying home all day, but a desire to change has started growing in her mind...
Experience the adolescence story, with Kaede as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*
description.pt-br:
O arco Kaede da série "Rascal", obras populares da Dengeki Bunko, serializadas como mangá!

Mais um dia de cuidar da casa para Azusagawa Kaede. Enquanto seu amado irmão mais velho estiver ao seu lado, ela está bem em ficar em casa o dia todo, mas um desejo de mudança começou a crescer em sua mente...
Experimente a história da adolescência, com Kaede como personagem principal, de uma maneira só possível através do mangá.

description.en:
Monarchy ended long ago in Korea, but there are still other countries with Kings, Queens, princes and princesses. What if Korea had continued monarchism? What if all the beautiful palaces which are now only historical relics were actually filled with people? What if the glamorous royal family still maintained the palace customs? Welcome to a world where Korea still has the royal family living their lives! But for Che-Kyung, a high-school girl, this is a tragedy, since she has to marry the prince who turns out to be a total jerk!  
  
The final volume (Vol. 28) of Goong is a collection of short stories that ranges from the past to the future of the main story.   
(comiXology)

title.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of Siscon Idol

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はシスコンアイドルの夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту девочки идола

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Siscon Idol no Yume wo Minai
